_comment: GrowAssess Test Format v1.0 - Use this as a template for creating tests
title: Sample Cognitive Assessment
description: A comprehensive cognitive test covering analytical reasoning, verbal comprehension, and problem-solving skills.

questions.content: If all roses are flowers and some flowers fade quickly, which statement must be true?
What number comes next in the sequence: 2, 6, 12, 20, 30, ?
questions._comment: Example with flexible points - each option has its own point value

questions.content: Which word is most opposite in meaning to 'EPHEMERAL'?
List as many uses as you can think of for a paperclip. Be creative - there are no wrong answers.
Describe a time when you had to solve a complex problem. What was your approach, and what was the outcome?
A company's revenue increased by 20% in Year 1 and decreased by 20% in Year 2. What is the net change from the original revenue?
questions._comment: Partial credit example - close answer (2%) gets 1 point, correct answer (4%) gets 3 points

questions.content:
You have 60 seconds to read the following paragraph and answer: What is the main argument?

"Remote work has fundamentally changed how organizations operate. While some argue it reduces collaboration, studies show that well-implemented remote policies can actually increase productivity by 13% while reducing operational costs. The key lies not in the location of work, but in the clarity of communication and the trust between team members."
If you were given unlimited resources to solve one global problem, what would you choose and why? Outline your approach.
